el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=2 rooms_high=2
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-bluegreen")
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c =="@" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) abyss(i-1,line) elseif c =="s" then set_stone( "st-stoneimpulse", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i,line, {player=0}) elseif c=="a" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc1"}) elseif c=="b" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc2"}) elseif c=="c" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc3"}) elseif c=="d" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc4"}) elseif c=="e" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc5"}) elseif c=="f" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc6"}) elseif c=="g" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc7"}) elseif c=="h" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc8"}) elseif c=="i" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc9"}) elseif c=="j" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc10"}) elseif c=="k" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc11"}) elseif c=="l" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funcc12"}) elseif c=="r" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccremove"}) elseif c == "D" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0010) elseif c == "9" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1100) elseif c == "7" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1001) elseif c == "=" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0101) elseif c == "I" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1010) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
-- Floor: " " -- Border: "#" -- Oxyd: "o"
renderLine(00,"####################@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@") renderLine(01,"# @") renderLine(02,"# 9===============7#@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @") renderLine(03,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @@") renderLine(04,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @!") renderLine(05,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @!") renderLine(06,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @!") renderLine(07,"# z #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @!") renderLine(08,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@ @!") renderLine(09,"# #@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @!") renderLine(10,"# @!") renderLine(11,"# #@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @!") renderLine(12,"# ##### #######!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@!") renderLine(13,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(14,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(15,"# ##########!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(16,"# abcd # #!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(17,"# efgh # D I #!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(18,"# ijkl ##########!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(19,"# D #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(20,"# #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(21,"#! !#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(22,"#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(23,"#r!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") renderLine(24,"##oooooooooooooooo##!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
oxyd_shuffle()
b1 =1 b2 =1 b3 =1 b4 =1 b5 =1 b6 =0 b7 =0 b8 =0 b9 =0 b10=0 b11=0 b12=1 b13=1 b14=1 b15=1 b16=1
br=1
ff1=0 function funcc1() if ff1==1 then ff1=0 elseif ff1==0 then block1() block2() block3() block4() ff1=1 end end
ff2=0 function funcc2() if ff2==1 then ff2=0 elseif ff2==0 then block3() block5() block13() block14() ff2=1 end end
ff3=0 function funcc3() if ff3==1 then ff3=0 elseif ff3==0 then block6() block7() block8() block10() ff3=1 end end
ff4=0 function funcc4() if ff4==1 then ff4=0 elseif ff4==0 then block2() block12() block13() block15() ff4=1 end end
ff5=0 function funcc5() if ff5==1 then ff5=0 elseif ff5==0 then block1() block8() block13() block15() ff5=1 end end
ff6=0 function funcc6() if ff6==1 then ff6=0 elseif ff6==0 then block3() block12() block14() block15() ff6=1 end end
ff7=0 function funcc7() if ff7==1 then ff7=0 elseif ff7==0 then block7() block9() block11() block13() ff7=1 end end
ff8=0 function funcc8() if ff8==1 then ff8=0 elseif ff8==0 then block1() block5() block14() block16() ff8=1 end end
ff9=0 function funcc9() if ff9==1 then ff9=0 elseif ff9==0 then block6() block8() block11() block16() ff9=1 end end
ff10=0 function funcc10() if ff10==1 then ff10=0 elseif ff10==0 then block2() block3() block4() block5() ff10=1 end end
ff11=0 function funcc11() if ff11==1 then ff11=0 elseif ff11==0 then block6() block7() block8() block10() ff11=1 end end
ff12=0 function funcc12() if ff12==1 then ff12=0 elseif ff12==0 then block10() block12() block14() block16() ff12=1 end end
ffr=0 function funccremove() if ffr==1 then ffr=0 elseif ffr==0 then blockremove() ffr=1 end end
function block1() if b1==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 2, 12) b1=1 elseif b1==1 then enigma.KillStone(2,12) b1=0 end end
function block2() if b2==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 3, 12) b2=1 elseif b2==1 then enigma.KillStone(3,12) b2=0 end end
function block3() if b3==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 4, 12) b3=1 elseif b3==1 then enigma.KillStone(4,12) b3=0 end end
function block4() if b4==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 5, 12) b4=1 elseif b4==1 then enigma.KillStone(5,12) b4=0 end end
function block5() if b5==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 6, 12) b5=1 elseif b5==1 then enigma.KillStone(6,12) b5=0 end end
function block6() if b6==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 7, 12) b6=1 elseif b6==1 then enigma.KillStone(7,12) b6=0 end end
function block7() if b7==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 8, 12) b7=1 elseif b7==1 then enigma.KillStone(8,12) b7=0 end end
function block8() if b8==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 9, 12) b8=1 elseif b8==1 then enigma.KillStone(9,12) b8=0 end end
function block9() if b9==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 10, 12) b9=1 elseif b9==1 then enigma.KillStone(10,12) b9=0 end end
function block10() if b10==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 11, 12) b10=1 elseif b10==1 then enigma.KillStone(11,12) b10=0 end end
function block11() if b11==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 12, 12) b11=1 elseif b11==1 then enigma.KillStone(12,12) b11=0 end end
function block12() if b12==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 13, 12) b12=1 elseif b12==1 then enigma.KillStone(13,12) b12=0 end end
function block13() if b13==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 14, 12) b13=1 elseif b13==1 then enigma.KillStone(14,12) b13=0 end end
function block14() if b14==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 15, 12) b14=1 elseif b14==1 then enigma.KillStone(15,12) b14=0 end end
function block15() if b15==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 16, 12) b15=1 elseif b15==1 then enigma.KillStone(16,12) b15=0 end end
function block16() if b16==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 17, 12) b16=1 elseif b16==1 then enigma.KillStone(17,12) b16=0 end end
function blockremove() if br==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", 19, 17) br=1 elseif br==1 then enigma.KillStone(19,17) br=0 end end
